GtkDataboxMM

The GooCanvasMM C++ binding provides a C++ interface on top of the
GooCanvas C library.

GooCanvas is a canvas widget for GTK+ that uses the cairo 2D library
for drawing.

Homepage: http://ftp.gnome.org/pub/GNOME/sources/goocanvasmm/0.15/

Copyright: Copyright 1998-2006 The gtkmm Development Team
           Copyright 2009, 2010 Openismus GmbH
           Copyright 1999-2001 Free Software Foundation

License: LGPL-2.1
 gtkdataboxmm is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it
 under the terms of the GNU Lesser General Public License as published
 by the Free Software Foundation, either version 2.1 of the License,
 or (at your option) any later version.
 .
 gtkdataboxmm is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but
 WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
 MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
 See the GNU Lesser General Public License for more details.
 .
 You should have received a copy of the GNU Lesser General Public License
 along with this program.  If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.

Version: 0.15.4

Note: To import a newer version it is necessary to run ./configure and
 import the file goocanvasmmconfig.h as well.

Patches:
 * fix-build.patch: Fix build on WIN32
